creator: jharrop@bigpond.net.au
text:
If more than one Host component contains a Context with a path equal to a zero
length string, then the logs say "StandardContext[]: Error initialising naming
context for context"

It works if just one Host component contains a path equal to a zero length string.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
The problem should have been fixed in recent nightly builds, according to my 
testing. If it's not, jsut reopen the bug.
